99548a1e-6795-4894-9f9e-0392ff8e1c15.name: Expert Tailoring
99548a1e-6795-4894-9f9e-0392ff8e1c15.notes: Gives opponents targeting you an additional -1 to target chinks in armor

3d36a639-80a9-42ed-a5b0-66a276937722.name: Brim
3d36a639-80a9-42ed-a5b0-66a276937722.notes: Protects face on 1/6 or 5/6 from above

0fce7450-65ce-4362-ae99-3f938a692cac.name: Cheek Guards
0fce7450-65ce-4362-ae99-3f938a692cac.notes: Covers Ears, Protects face on 3/6, Gives Hard of Hearing

6b92e16f-cab1-4663-a770-39965ceab7d9.name: Cheek Guards
6b92e16f-cab1-4663-a770-39965ceab7d9.notes: Covers Ears, Protects face on 3/6, Gives Hard of Hearing

2d7e1072-1157-47ae-bced-c403ad49d7d7.name: Perforations
2d7e1072-1157-47ae-bced-c403ad49d7d7.notes: For helme that cover the ears. Reduces Hard of Hearing and Chink targetting penalty by 2

b69c2cb9-4dd2-4f79-87dd-2e751a5104ec.name: Spectacles
b69c2cb9-4dd2-4f79-87dd-2e751a5104ec.notes: Protects face on 1/6, No Peripheral Vision, Target eyes at -10

ac0706b5-6c46-49d9-b8fa-6d57aa43f443.name: Visor
ac0706b5-6c46-49d9-b8fa-6d57aa43f443.notes: Protects face on 5/6. Hard of Hearing, No Peripheral Vision

70eedc9d-a421-4631-94a1-306fe43bf691.name: Fine
70eedc9d-a421-4631-94a1-306fe43bf691.notes: Fencing weapons, knives, swords, and missile weapons.

e7ef0dcf-55c3-49bd-9c3b-9bf5b583e121.name: Fine
e7ef0dcf-55c3-49bd-9c3b-9bf5b583e121.notes: Other cutting melee or thrown weapons.

f5adb800-0c1f-4b44-bf64-69efdbcd4e77.name: Fine
f5adb800-0c1f-4b44-bf64-69efdbcd4e77.notes: Projectiles, and crushing- or impaling-only melee or thrown weapons.

5472793a-c0bd-4947-a79e-758d2f60988b.name: Masterful Tailoring
5472793a-c0bd-4947-a79e-758d2f60988b.notes: Gives opponents targeting you an additional -1 to target chinks in armor

c3d9b08f-206c-46a6-a0ba-6d205461dad9.name: Very Fine
c3d9b08f-206c-46a6-a0ba-6d205461dad9.notes: Other melee or thrown weapons, and projectiles.

3d04f2ac-01ea-41a8-8437-6c46cfb47551.name: Weapon damage modifiers included where applicable
3d04f2ac-01ea-41a8-8437-6c46cfb47551.notes: You may need to change the modifiers directly if a weapon deals crush and cut.
